arts.ttl: Burnley vs Leeds United: Pre-match Analysis
arts.sum: Burnley return from the international break looking to put an end to their recent run of poor results and earn themselves a win at their home ground, Turf Moor. However, a silver lining for the Clarets is that they have got the majority of their quote on quote tougher fixtures out of the way early and can put together a good run of form with games against Leeds and Wolverhampton Wanderers back to back.

arts.ttl: Premier League LIVE: Ange Postecoglou sacked by Nottingham Forest, five games to come

The Whites have performed above expectations so far this season, sitting in 15th place. arts.ttl: Harrison starts for Leeds at Burnley who change three LIVE!
arts.sum: Last season’s top two teams in the Championship meet in the Premier League at Turf Moor as Burnley host Leeds . Scott Parker's side lost at Aston Villa before the October international break and have taken just one point from their last five league games.

arts.sum: Burnley and Leeds United go head-to-head today in their first clash after the October international break. arts.ttl: Burnley vs Leeds United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: A crucial relegation six-pointer takes place at Turf Moor on Saturday as Burnley host fellow newly-promoted side Leeds United, with both teams desperate for three points.
